title: Australian diary. No. 004
creator_credit: Jack S. Allan and Australian National Film Board
brief_description: Newsreel magazine items featuring: New recruits to surf carnivals; Preserving a link with a great explorer - Captain Cook’s cottage; Life at remote Hermannsburg Mission; Young girl causes stir in literary world - 17 year old Catherine Gaskin; Australia’s Golden Mile - Kalgoorlie, W.A.
